analysis.description:
FUTR.payFees (/unique_chucks/8/0xc83355ef25a104938275b46cffd94bf9917d0691.sol#422-446) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- foundation.transfer(fees / 2) (/unique_chucks/8/0xc83355ef25a104938275b46cffd94bf9917d0691.sol#440)
	- owner.transfer(fees / 4) (/unique_chucks/8/0xc83355ef25a104938275b46cffd94bf9917d0691.sol#441-442)
	- dev.transfer(fees / 4) (/unique_chucks/8/0xc83355ef25a104938275b46cffd94bf9917d0691.sol#443)

FUTR.MAX_SUBMITTED should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xc83355ef25a104938275b46cffd94bf9917d0691.sol#8-10)
FUTR.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xc83355ef25a104938275b46cffd94bf9917d0691.sol#66-67)
FUTR.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xc83355ef25a104938275b46cffd94bf9917d0691.sol#64-65)
FUTR.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xc83355ef25a104938275b46cffd94bf9917d0691.sol#67)
